name: Honedge

ability.name: Possessed Sword
ability.effect: You may treat Honedge as a Pokemon Tool: When attached to a Pokemon, that Pokemon's attacks deal 20 more damage, and deal 20 damage to the attacker. When it is knocked out, the opponent picks up an extra prize card.

attacks.name: Haunt
attacks.effect: You may discard the Defending Pokemon's Pokemon Tool. If you do, deal 20 more damage.

flavor: Swords taken by spirits of the warriors that once wielded them. They continue to crave battle, and are known to haunt the ones that killed them.
